2E2ABD36FCFF1CC5.title: Nah, I'll go with Distilled Water.

display.title: Washing with Distilled Water
description: Nothing special here. Any ores that you don't wash in novelty chemicals simply need to be washed in water with an &&dOre Washer&&r. You should use Distilled Water, as it cuts the recipe time down by &&650%&&r. Set up a couple of Distilleries on-site and buffer into an appropriately-sized &&aSuper Tank&&r.
If you don't care about the byproducts in this section, you can wash the ores in &&bregular water&&r without a configured circuit to process &&225x&&r faster, but &&4without&&r byproducts.
